Panda Bear

It's weird the things that will set me off. This picture breaks

my fucking

heart.

June 07, 2011

Lately I've been busy enough to forget about things for large chunks of my day. Then something will trigger a thought or a memory and the wave of emotions, the front load washer spin cycle kicks into high gear and it'll even throw in some guilt about having forgotten. Just for good measure. I'm having to just plow through; and I wonder what it's doing to me.

The Memorial Record

Colophon

I am Daniel Miller and I'm writing here about my attempts to deal with the loss of my beautiful, perfect one year old daughter Margot Rose. You can read about that here.

This site runs on Jekyll, which I still haven't really figured out. Header foreground & footer background is Snowy Flora. If you are using IE, you should switch to Google Chrome; you will thank me later.
